Suffixing the name of a file

A small utility function to derive a file path by appending something to the name (and only to the name).

{% raw %}

supplement_file_name[source]

supplement_file_name(file:Union[str, Path], sup:str)

Adds a string between the file name in a path and the suffix.

Parameters

  • file : str

    File name

  • sup : str

    String to be added

Returns

  • out: pathlib.Path

    "Supplemented" file

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
supplement_file_name('/a/b/picture.tex', '1')
{% endraw %}

Generating a unique file name

{% raw %}

unique_name[source]

unique_name(file:Union[str, Path])

Builds a unique file name out of a given one.

Parameters

  • file : str

    Input file name.

Returns

  • out: pathlib.Path

    Unique file name.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
unique_name('docs/a.pdf')
{% endraw %}
